testCases.label: Verify compareTo returns 0 for equal values
testCases.description: Creates two SampleClassC objects with the same val field and checks that compareTo returns 0.

testCases.label: Verify compareTo returns a negative value when obj1 < obj2
testCases.description: Creates obj1 with a smaller val than obj2 and verifies that obj1.compareTo(obj2) returns a negative number.

testCases.label: Verify compareTo returns a positive value when obj1 > obj2
testCases.description: Creates obj1 with a greater val than obj2 and checks that obj1.compareTo(obj2) returns a positive number.
